about_the_game:
In a world where Demons and Dragons are enemies, you must fight enemies, dangerous bosses and explore mysterious dungeons. There is so much to do in the world of Kira Legends, wether it's enagaging combat, intense boss fights, unleashing your inner dragon while flying around the vast world or just playing with friends, there is never a moment where you aren't having a blast.

Here are just some of features you'll get to enjoy in Kira Legends

- Immersive Melee Combat
.

- Unlock new Weapons and Items
.

- Interact with new characters
.

short_description: Experience an Action Packed RPG as you slay monsters with mastered sword combat and Unleash Your Inner Dragon abilities as you take on the form of both human and Dragon. Kill off all the Demons as you make your way from your peaceful Hometown to the depths of the Underworld.
